body_html:
I've tried to explain the basics of TFRecords in this post: TFRecords for Humans. Maybe it's helpful for at least some aspects?

I'm thinking of continuing to write, specifically on working with images, and perhaps also on reading in-graph.

body:
I've tried to explain the basics of TFRecords in this post: [TFRecords for Humans](http://planspace.org/20170323-tfrecords_for_humans/). Maybe it's helpful for at least some aspects?

I'm thinking of continuing to write, specifically on working with images, and perhaps also on reading in-graph.
